item.title: Report X-2023100112
item.description:
Report X-2023100112

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was brought to Quality assurance wet and leaking, package was immediately put into a hazmat bag and spill bin. DescribePack: two canisters had approximately 5 mm punctures along the bottom of the canisters. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed into a spill bin and a hazmat bag.

item.title: Report X-2023090614
item.description:
Report X-2023090614

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME TO QA LEAKING. UPON CLOSER INSPECTION FOUND THAT THE PLASTIC BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS CAUSING THEM TO LEAK OUT INTO THE BOX. NO INNER PACKING. LOOKED TO HAVE BEEN LOADED ON SIDE A PREVOUS LOCATION. ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY TEH BOX. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA.
